item.description:
Sample the flavors of the seacoast at New England's largest seaside festival.
Over 50 restaurants join together, offering an extensive menu of seafood!
Gala festivities include: over 60 Art & Craft dealers, 3 stages of entertainment, street performers, a 200 foot beer tent, sidewalk bargain sales!
EAT, DRINK, LAUGH, SWIM, SUN, PEOPLE WATCH!
Carpool with your friends and join in on a great day!
Directions below:
Take I95 to Exit 2 in Hampton
Bear Left after Hampton Toll Booth onto 101 East towards Hampton
Take the first Exit, Exit 13 to Rte. 27 East
Follow the signs to any of the 13 FREE Park and FREE Shuttle Parking lots.


WE WILL MEET in front of THE SEA KETCH restaurant right on the Boulevard diagonally across from the SEA SHELL STAGE between 10 – 10:30am. (Please call me if you’re going to be late, or not coming).
There are several locations to park FREE and ride a Shuttle bus to the event. These parking areas will be well marked as you approach the area (this is all FREE). Click the following link to view locations; http://www.hamptonbeachseafoodfestival.com/directions.cfm
The main drag section by the beach will be closed to traffic so it would be wise not to drive in too far. You can navigate the above link to learn more of the event.
My cell number is; (603) 204-1657 (It will be turned on 1st thing in the morning – my time) – I’ll be there a bit before 10:00am (if all goes well) and I’ll be wearing a cap with a “MEETUP” pin on the back.
Please post your questions/comments in the case that I’ve left something out, or you can email me directly.

group.name: Meeting & Greeting in So. NH & the Merrimack Valley :)

item.name: SUNDAY FESTIVAL @ THE BEACH!
